DOC.brief_summary: Evolution of swallowing in patients undergoing lateral pharyngoplasty with preservation stylopharyngeal muscle.
DOC.brief_title: Evolution of Swallowing in Patients Undergoing Lateral Pharyngoplasty With Preservation Stylopharyngeal Muscle
DOC.detailed_description: refer patients to the side pharyngoplasty with total preservation of stylopharyngeal muscle and evaluate the total recovery time of swallowing, making a daily assessment.
DOC.criteria: patients with obstructive sleep apnea with surgical indication patients with obstructive sleep apnea without surgical indication
